name: Aah, a Ghost!
description:
Payment is optional! (I wouldn't pay for this either)

Made in 5 days for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam. In hindsight I probably shouldn't have joined a beginner's jam, so I won't contribute any further projects. I liked the concept of starting and finishing a game in 5 days, as I have been messing around with Unity for a few months but haven't actually finished any games for a long time.

I'm considering WebGL target for Newgrounds too.

SOURCE CODE: https://github.com/porkandbeans/Aah-a-ghost
